Title: Polis Evo
Writer: Anwari Ashraf, Anwari Ashraf, Kyle Goonting, Kyle Goonting, Joel Soh, Joel Soh, Adib Zaini, Adib Zaini
Actors: Shaheizy Sam, Zizan Razak, Nora Danish, Hushairi Husain
Plot: Big city cop and small-town-big-cop must learn to work together in order to take down Malaysia's biggest drug lord.
